role.name: anonymous
role.description: Anybody not registered in the BODC database. As BODC needs to provide originators with information on who has accessed their data, no data can be delivered to anonymous users. However, anonymous users can access metadata.

role.name: public
role.description: Anybody registered with BODC.

role.name: commercial
role.description: A user who makes financial gain from data supplied or who works for an organisation that makes such a financial gain.

role.name: government
role.description: A user who works for a central or local government department. Excludes Research Councils.

role.name: academic
role.description: A user engaged in bona fide academic research.

role.name: BODCstaff
role.description: A current member of BODC staff.

role.name: metOfficeForm
role.description: A user who has filled in the Met Office licence agreement and had that licence accepted by the Met Office.

role.name: FRSAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with explicit Fisheries Research Services Marine Laboratory. FRS also determines membership duration.

role.name: NOCS_NERCAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of Director NOCS, head of NOCS divisions or their delegates. NOCS also determines membership duration.

role.name: ConocoPhillipsAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of ConocoPhillips, who also determine the duration of membership

role.name: ESBDAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of the Electricity Supply Board, Dublin, who also determine the duration of membership

role.name: IrHydAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of Irish Hydrodata, who also determine the duration of membership

role.name: ShellAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of Shell Expro, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: BPAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of BP, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: TotalAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of Total, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: WessWAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of Wessex Water Authority, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: NERPRBAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of NERPB, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: SWWAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of South West Water, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: UnivBrGeolAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of University of Bristol Geology Department, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: UnivCambEScAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of University of Cambridge Earth Sciences Department, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: UnivEdinGeolAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of University of Edinburgh Geology Department, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: UWBSOSAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of University Wales Bangor School of Ocean Sciences, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: WelshWAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of Welsh Water Authority, who also determine the duration of membership

role.name: NPAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of National Power/Nuclear Electric, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: HRAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of Hydraulics Research, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: ChevronAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of Chevron Petroleum, who also determine the duration of membership

role.name: SAMSAuth
role.description: Users may only be added to this list with the explicit permission of Director SAMS or their delegate, who also determine duration of membership.

role.name: PortErinAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of the Port Erin Marine Laboratory, who also determine the duration of membership

role.name: CEFASAuth
role.description: Users may only be added with the explicit permission of CEFAS, who also determine the duration of membership.

role.name: POLAuth
role.description: Users may only be added to this list with the explicit permission of Director POL or their delegate, who also determine duration of membership.

role.name: GEOSAuth
role.description: Users may only be added to this list with the explicit permission of FugroGEOS, who also determine duration of membership.

roleSet.description: These are groups of users who gain rights to assets on the basis of project membership. Users may have any number of these roles assigned

role.name: MarProdMemb
role.description: Principal and co-investigators of the Marine Productivity Project or people designated by them as workers on the project.

role.name: AUIMemb
role.description: Principal and co-investigators of the Autosub Under Ice Project.

role.name: MFMBMemb
role.description: Principal and co-investigators of the Marine and Freshwater Microbial Biodiversity Project or people designated by them as workers on the project.

role.name: RapidMemb
role.description: Principal and co-investigators of the Rapid Project or people designated by them as workers on the project.

role.name: MOCMemb
role.description: Principal and co-investigators of the MOC sub-project of the Rapid project or people designated by them as workers on the sub-project.

role.name: DeltaFlumeMemb
role.description: Principal and co-investigators of the Deltaflume project or people designated by them as workers on the project.

role.name: AMTMemb
role.description: Principal and co-investigators of the Atlantic Meridianal Transect Project or people designated by them as workers on the project
